entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:20 p.m. MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 14. Forecast issued 7:49 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
